sm::eod::FeatureLine

FeatureLine Class Reference

#include <featureline.h>

Inherits FeatureOutputData.

List of all members.

Detailed Description

A feature within an image that is represented by a line.

Definition at line 19 of file featureline.h.

void setEndPoints ( float  x1,
float  y1,
float  x2,
float  y2 
)

Set the endpoints of the line.

Parameters:
x1 X-coordinate of the start of the line in normalised image coordinates
y1 Y-coordinate of the start of the line in normalised image coordinates
x2 X-coordinate of the end of the line in normalised image coordinates
y2 Y-coordinate of the end of the line in normalised image coordinates
Precondition:
x1 in range 0..1 or x1 == invalidValue()

y1 in range 0..1 or y1 == invalidValue()

x2 in range 0..1 or x2 == invalidValue()

y2 in range 0..1 or y2 == invalidValue()

float x1 (  )  const

Returns:
x-coordinate of the start of the line. This is a normalised value (between 0 and 1) and is in image coordinates Set to invalidValue() if this value is invalid

float x2 (  )  const

Returns:
x-coordinate of the end of the line This is a normalised value (between 0 and 1) and is in image coordinates Set to invalidValue() if this value is invalid

float y1 (  )  const

Returns:
y-coordinate of the start of the line This is a normalised value (between 0 and 1) and is in image coordinates Set to invalidValue() if this value is invalid

float y2 (  )  const

Returns:
y-coordinate of the end of the line This is a normalised value (between 0 and 1) and is in image coordinates Set to invalidValue() if this value is invalid
